21cf1068-5c9c-4bfc-a4b2-68db08242a30: A bane weapon excels against certain foes. Against a designated foe, the weapon's enhancement {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is +2 better than its actual bonus. 791a83ba-5f08-4b89-ab18-edf3b080b9a7: A barely noticeable smoke is coming out from tiny cracks in this staff.

875a5751-ebaa-41b2-8bfb-a36cf72fec91: The golden plates on this staff are contrasted by the weapon's dark wood.
